Package gui.Ingame

package gui.Ingame
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CellPane
    Represents a single tile/grid cell on the game map.
    GameCanvas
    The main game container.
    GameOverPanel
    A modal panel displayed when the game ends (Win or Lose).
    GhostTowerPreview
    A dedicated Canvas for drawing the tower placement preview.
    InGameMenu
    The pause menu overlay displayed when the game is paused.
    Map
    The visual representation of the game grid.
    MoneyText
    HUD element displaying the player's current money.
    TowerSelector
    The bottom toolbar allowing players to select which tower to build.
    UpgradePanel
    A floating UI panel that appears when a user clicks on an existing tower.
    WaveText
    HUD element displaying the current wave number.
